about_the_game:
The demo version of EyeLove Survival!
Survive the onslaught of an endless horde of monsters!

Kill monsters, gather their eyes, improve yourself!

In this roguelite survival game, all you can do is survive as long as you can.
Gather eyes for level up current run.
Gather credits in each run to buy upgrades and help the next survivor.

Unique Builds Every Run

Select from a variety of upgrades to create a unique and overpowered builds every run. You can be a summoner-Drone Operator, for example, and destroy monsters with drones, or ranged sniper who use electrobullets to pierce enemies.

Select Your Hero

Choose from a diverse selection of characters and weapons that offer a variety of gameplay experiences.

Features

  • Over 30 different upgrades too choose from for a unique experience every run!
  • Wide cast of characters and their personalities, with more to come post-launch.
  • Casual quick 10-20 minute play sessions, for busy gamers.
  • Weapon, Orb and Item System helps you become stronger

Future planned features

  • Cooperative Gameplay. Fight against hordes of enemies with friends
  • PvP Gameplay. Play against over players in Moba-style modes

name: Grimdark Survivors Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: To save your world, take out an expanding horde of monsters. To develop one-of-a-kind and game-breaking builds, select from a selection of upgrades. Unlock a wide variety of characters and weapons with special abilities.
